name: html-and-css
description: An introduction to HTML & CSS for use on the GA Web Development Immersive course.

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:<username>/<repo> gh-pages --force

author: Alex Chin
